title: Constructively Aligned Instructional Design for Learning Data Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Educational Data Collection Concept Understanding
context.additional_context: Enhancing educational effectiveness and employment competencies through learner-customized data design

learning_goals: Learners can systematically align learning objectives and assessment methods according to constructive alignment principles.
Learners can analyze and interpret learning data generated by digital tools to establish personalized learning strategies.
Learners can visualize and self-assess their learning progress using an Open Learner Model (OLM) interface.
Learners can structure semantic relationships between learning data by applying ontology concepts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
